billing.pricing.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
billing.pricing.faq.changePlans.question: Can I change plans anytime?
billing.pricing.faq.changePlans.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately. If you upgrade mid-month, we'll prorate the charges. If you downgrade, the change applies to your next billing cycle.
billing.pricing.faq.buildingLimit.questi: What happens if I exceed my building limit?
billing.pricing.faq.buildingLimit.answer: If you're approaching your building limit, we'll send you a notification. You can easily upgrade to a higher plan to accommodate more properties. We don't penalize you for going over—we encourage you to upgrade!
billing.pricing.faq.freeTrial.question: Is there a free trial?
billing.pricing.faq.freeTrial.answer: Yes! All new accounts get a 14-day free trial of our Professional plan so you can explore all features before committing. No credit card required to start.
billing.pricing.faq.paymentMethods.quest: What payment methods do you accept?
billing.pricing.faq.paymentMethods.answe: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), bank transfers (SEPA), and digital wallets. All payments are secure and encrypted.
